manifest.name: Spring Celebration Pack
manifest.author: Donegeon Team
manifest.description: A bundle of fresh quests and items to celebrate the arrival of spring.

quests.title: Garden Preparation
quests.description: Help clear a garden bed and prepare it for planting.

quests.title: Egg Painting
quests.description: Decorate and dye eggs for the spring celebration.

quests.title: Spring Cleaning Sweep
quests.description: Help with a deep clean of one room in the house.

quests.title: Help Prepare the Feast
quests.description: Assist in making a special meal for the celebration.

quests.title: Plant a Seedling
quests.description: Plant a new flower or vegetable in the garden.

quests.title: Hide the Eggs
quests.description: Help hide the decorated eggs for the hunt.

markets.title: The Blooming Market
markets.description: Fresh goods and festive attire for the spring season.

gameAssets.name: Bunny Ears
gameAssets.description: A pair of floppy bunny ears for your avatar.

gameAssets.name: Basket of Plenty
gameAssets.description: A decorative basket to hold all your spring treasures.

gameAssets.name: Forest Theme
gameAssets.description: Unlocks the lush 'Forest' theme for your app.

trophies.name: Egg Hunt Champion
trophies.description: Find the most eggs during the spring hunt.
